faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our app
faq.a1: AgriModel is a comprehensive platform designed to help farmers optimize their agricultural practices through data-driven insights, weather monitoring, and sustainable farming techniques.
faq.q2: How do I create an account?
faq.a2: To create an account, download our app, click on 'Sign Up' on the login screen, and follow the instructions to register with your email and personal information.
faq.a3: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All your information is encrypted and stored securely following industry best practices.
faq.q4: Can I use the app offline?
faq.a4: Yes, many features of the app work offline. Your data will sync automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
faq.q5: How do I reset my password?
faq.a5: On the login screen, click 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions sent to your registered email address.
faq.a6: Yes, our support team is available via email, phone, or through the in-app help section to assist you with any issues.
